column1: Smoque BBQ////Why 3 stars?  I have been to Lockhart
column4: Texas.  The food at Smoque is as good
column6: unlike Blacks or Smittys or Meyers or Muellers
column7: Smoque doesn't have soul.  Well managed
column11: one day it will be laid back and the walls and tables will smell like smoke.  Time will tell.
